message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $15000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now.  Would you be willing to consider $12000?  I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $13500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll still get a lot of value out of it.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $13500 is closer, I'm still a bit over my budget.  Could you consider $12500?  I'm confident we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement at this price.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $13000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  $13000 is still a bit more than I can manage right now.  I'm willing to go up to $12750.  This is my final offer, as I'm approaching my budget limit.  I hope we can reach an agreement.

I understand you're getting close to your budget limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $12900. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
